reviews.text: he's definitely the chillest teacher at lowell. the easiest A you will ever get. he's very lenient on a lot of things. you can study quizlets to help you with the vocab, but you're gonna have to pay attention in class if you want to learn the grammar. he teaches, but it's on you to pay attention. definitely the best teacher and class you will ever take at lowell! you won't regret it.
